definition: borne up by or suspended in a liquid, the act of someone who floats on the water
details:
adjective
- borne up by or suspended in a liquid
= example: borne up by or suspended in a liquid
- inclined to move or be moved about
= example: inclined to move or be moved about
- continually changing especially as from one abode or occupation to another
= synonyms: aimless, drifting, vagabond
- not definitely committed to a party or policy
- (of a part of the body) not firmly connected
noun
- the act of someone who floats on the water
= synonyms: natation
